posts.caption: arvixe.com
posts.description: ASP .NET Windows web hosting services at affordable prices. Free domain registration, 99.9% uptime and 60 day money back guarantee offered on all plans.

المهم انا عملت بوت وجيه واحد سالنى واحد على الsource code فانا رفضت لانى معرفش حاجة فى الرخص والحاجات دى ولانو ممكن يستخدمه باسمه فهل الى انا عملته ده صح؟!

posts.message:
Hello, 
If you see a post that you think it doesn't belong to the group, either because it is trivial perfectly Googlable question, spam or even just weird or rude, please REPORT the post, then the moderators and admins will see it.
Remember the responsibility to keep this community quality bar high is not only the admins, and the admins are not able to see each and every post on the group.
Thanks

posts.message:
#Javascript #Scopes #Closures #NestedFunctions
I tried but couldn't solve this problem on my own:

Create a function sum that will work like that: sum(a)(b) = a+b and accepts any number of brackets.

For instance:
sum(1)(2) == 3
sum(5)(-1)(2) == 6
sum(6)(-1)(-2)(-3) == 0
sum(0)(1)(2)(3)(4)(5) == 15
